name: 霓虹攀升 Neon Ascending
description:
Introduction
  • A rouge-like tower defense game
  • Stack buff and go beyond the limits
Feature
  • Simple and easy to understand, good time killer
  • Nice neon style
  • Stack different Buffs for faster strength growth
  • 40 available modules, placed according to your strategy
  • Support Chinese, English

Developer's plan
  • More modules to be updated soon, like in a few working days
  • Support more languages sooner
Notice
  • This game is still in early access so it's cheaper and simpler right now
  • Thist is my first game and I just want to say proud to be here!
简介
  • 一款从简单到复杂的rouge-like塔防游戏，叠加Buff超越极限
特色
  • 简单易懂，消磨时间
  • 漂亮的霓虹风格
  • 叠加不同Buff，谋求更快的实力增长
  • 40种可用模块，按照你的策略摆放
  • 支持中文，英语
开发者的计划
  • 即将更新更多模块
  • 即将支持更多语言
须知
  • 此游戏仍处于抢先体验阶段，因此现在更便宜、玩法更简单
  • 这是我的第一个游戏，我想说很自豪能做到这一步
